CustomField.formula:
IF (List_Price__c > 0,
IF( ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c,"Direct Annual"),
((List_Price_Less_Default_Discounts__c - (Amount + Sum_of_Rebates__c)) / List_Price__c)-0.1,
((List_Price_Less_Default_Discounts__c - (Amount + Sum_of_Rebates__c)) / List_Price__c)
)
, 0)
CustomField.label: Blended Discretionary Discount
